content.rendered:
We believe that valuable research reports that have been funded by companies are too often only to be found on the company website.

As a result, the resource we are planning for educators in schools, further education and higher education is a database of research reports that will be easy to search.

If you would like to participate in this new venture please complete this short questionnaire that requests the details of the research you have in mind.

https://forms.gle/znpvvnMMSH5G2i97A

I shall be pleased to discuss our ideas with you if you contact me directly. christina@mirandanet.ac.uk
